location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: Letter reports that Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan] has obeyed the phirmaund [firman] issued by Carim Caun [Karim Khan] to Abraham regarding the Bushire Factory and discusses other political developments. Administrative issues are also discussed.
